Title: Charles-Hubert Paris 3576-W Mechanical Pocket Watch

Paired with a curb chain so it is always easily accessible, the timepiece has a skeleton dial with Roman numerals and includes a gift box. Matching curb chain. Skeleton dial. Roman numerals. 17 jewel mechanical movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 1.96 in. Dia. Since 1990, Charles-Hubert Pans has been a major influence in the United States watch industry. By including both retro and contemporary designs in its line, Charles-Hubert Paris has established a large and loyal following. With its unprecedented Lifetime Warranties, exceptional quality standards and affordable pricing, the future looks very bright for Charles-Hubert Paris.
